title: OxygenOS 12 Open Beta 3 based on Android 12 rolls out to the OnePlus Nord
content:
While OnePlus is busy shaping up Android 13 through its Developer Preview program, the company is also reminding users that it hasnâ€™t forgotten about the OnePlus Nord by releasing an update through its Open Beta program. It may take several more rounds of Open Beta releases before we see the final stable OxygenOS 12 build

The post OxygenOS 12 Open Beta 3 based on Android 12 rolls out to the OnePlus Nord appeared first on XDA.
description: OnePlus has begun rolling out the third Open Beta of OxygenOS 12 for the OnePlus Nord, introducing new fixes and stability improvements.
